description: Memory management utilities and operations for the Kairo language

enums.name: AddressType
enums.description: Type of memory address for any pointer

types.name: buffer<T, N>
types.description: Creates a fixed-size buffer of type T with size N, same safety as C arrays (not very safe, use with caution)

functions.name: address_type
functions.description: Returns the type of memory address for a pointer

functions.name: new_aligned<T>
functions.description: Allocates memory for a type with specified alignment (alignment of T) and arguments

functions.name: delete_aligned<T>
functions.description: Deallocates memory for a type allocated with new_aligned

functions.name: as_reference<T>
functions.description: Converts a pointer to an lvalue reference type

functions.name: as_pointer<T>
functions.description: Converts a reference to a pointer type

functions.name: exchange<T>
functions.description: Atomically exchanges the value at the pointer with the specified value, returns the old value

functions.name: forward<T>
functions.description: Forwards a value as an rvalue reference, used for perfect forwarding in function templates

functions.name: heap_start
functions.description: Returns the start address of the heap memory region

functions.name: copy
functions.description: Copies memory from source to destination

functions.name: move
functions.description: Moves memory from source to destination

functions.name: set
functions.description: Sets a block of memory to a specified value

functions.name: find<T>
functions.description: Finds the first occurrence of a value in a block of memory
functions.signature: find<T>(ptr: *const void, value: i32, size: usize) -> *T?

functions.name: compare
functions.description: Compares two blocks of memory for equality
functions.signature: compare(ptr1: *const void, ptr2: *const void, size: usize) -> i32

functions.name: in_rotdata
functions.description: Checks if a pointer is in the ROTData memory region

functions.name: stack_size
functions.description: Returns the size of the stack memory region

functions.name: stack_start
functions.description: Returns the start address of the stack memory region

functions.name: stack_bounds
functions.description: Returns the bounds of the stack memory region as a pair of pointers

functions.name: in_stack
functions.description: Checks if a pointer is in the stack memory region
